rules_text:
Reach
When Slobbering Moa enters, mill four cards, then you may put a land card with a mana ability from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: [i]Sicklefruit was an invasive vegetation introduced by the crash, and it posed a threat to the frontier's crops. Luckily, the moas found it quite the tasty treat.[/i]
